form-role-type-meta-ADMIN: Can manage their company data, supply chain network and team members, but will also have access to the SETH admin board
form-role-type-meta-SUPPLIER_EDITOR: Can manage their company data, supply chain network and team members
form-role-type-meta-ACCOUNT_MANAGER: Can manage the supply chain network connections and invite other team members as account manager or viewers
form-role-type-meta-SUPPLIER_VIEWER: Can view all the data and connections of their company but won't be able to manage them
